citation.title: Applying critical realism in qualitative research: methodology meets method

wikipedia.title: Critical realism (philosophy of the social sciences)
wikipedia.summary: Critical realism is a philosophical approach associated with Roy Bhaskar that combines a general philosophy of science (transcendental realism) with a philosophy of social science (critical naturalism) to describe an interface between the natural and socia
